name: Mushy's Adventure [Prototype]
description:
Mushy's Adventure 0.8.4 THIS IS A PROTOTYPE OF THE GAME.

This game is a platformer game. You play as a mushroom. There are only 1 level, and it's a tutorial level...

The game will be further developed! There will be more levels,  boss, and more game mechanics!

This game will be later on Android and IOS with more levels. Stay tuned!
